title: This latest firefox update (version 89) causes everything slow (when multi-tab open)
content:
I've never had this problem before until I updated the firefox to version 89. Everytime I have multi-tabs open, and switching among them will cause the slow now or refresh.

Does anybody else have this problem?
creator: diesellam

title: Search bar on the New Tab Page
content:
I just updated to FF89. When I start typing in the search bar located in the New Tab page, the cursor jumps to the address bar and I get the search suggestions in the address bar. In previous versions of FF the cursor stayed in the New Tab page. How can I go back to the old behavior?

Thanks!
creator: chulipi

title: CRAP 87, 88 ,89 firefox.
content: How can I install ver 86 of firefox and prevent it from ever updating. I want the web sites I have visited for years to work again. I don't care if it is NOT "SECURE" WHAT! none of them have been secure. Neither is this 89 ver. When next mozilla wishes to force upon its users no end of frustrations. The reason will be because 89 is not secure!!!!! Give me a break already.
creator: danieldgg01

title: 3 dots sharing menu gone ?  (OSX Big Sur, FF89.0)
content:
I think there used to be a sharing menu, on or near the address bar. The "..." button or menu had all the macos sharing options.

seems to have moved in 89.0

am i missing somethingÂ ?


Thanks.
